RAR Top 100 agencies revealed: WRG claims top spot for 2012 | The Drum

23 Nov 2012

http://www.thedrum.com/news/2012/11/21/rar-top-100-agencies-revealed-wrg-claims-top-spot-2012

Second on the list, TH_NK saw turnover growth of 144 per cent, rising from £5,201,000 in 2011 to £12,735,700, with gross profit growth worth £4,736,500.
